section.17: The Book of Praying for Rain (Al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'If Allah (SWT) were to withhold rain from His slaves for five years and then send it, some of the people would become disbelievers, saying: "We have been given rain by the star of Al-Mijdah
